properties.notes: Unidentified assailants attacked and destroyed an entire house of an elderly man of Kiramira neighbourhood of Murwi town and commune in Cibitoke province on 12 August. The man and his family were able to flee. The victim had previously been accused of witchcraft.

properties.actor1: Unidentified Armed Group (Burundi)
properties.notes: On 12 August, a grenade detonated after it was picked up by children, killing one of them and wounding the other in Gitega.

properties.actor1: CNDD-FDD-Imbonerakure: National Council for the Defence of Democracy (Imbonerakure Faction)
properties.assoc_actor_2: FNL-A: National Forces of Liberation (Abarundi Faction)
properties.notes: On 11 August 2018, the president of the FNL Abarundi faction in Makamba, Rusaka commune was arrested by Imbonerakure led by the Makamba zone police chief on Nyamugogo Hill. He is accused of selling prohibited drinks. Although it is mainly believed that it is because of his political affiliation.

properties.actor1: CNDD-FDD: National Council for the Defence of Democracy-Forces for the Defence of Democracy
properties.notes: A CNDD-FDD party member of Gatagura hill in Butanuka area of Mpanda commune in Bubanza province raped a teenage girl on August 11, 2018.

properties.actor1: Unidentified Armed Group (Burundi)
properties.assoc_actor_2: CNDD-FDD: National Council for the Defence of Democracy-Forces for the Defence of Democracy; Teachers (Burundi)
properties.notes: A young teacher who was a member of CNDD-FDD party from Rubindi hill in Mukungu area of Nyanza-Lac commune of Makamba province was found dead in the local area on 11 August 2018. The attackers strangled him to death in Mabanda commune. The perpetrators and motives of the killing are unknown.

properties.actor1: CNDD-FDD-Imbonerakure: National Council for the Defence of Democracy (Imbonerakure Faction)
properties.notes: Looting: Report of regular lootings and harassment by Imbonerakure youth and police in Cibitoke zone (source dated August 10th).

properties.actor1: Police Forces of Burundi (2005-)
properties.notes: On 10 August, a shopkeeper was beaten and seriously wounded by policemen in Magara, Bujumbura, as he didn't close his shop during the presidential parade.

properties.actor1: Unidentified Armed Group (Burundi)
properties.notes: 08 September. A civilian was abducted by an unidentified armed group in Ngozi province.

properties.actor1: Unidentified Armed Group (Burundi)
properties.notes: During two weeks around 8 August 2018, gunmen carried out attacks in Gihanga commune, killing three Burundian soldiers and injuring more than five others (3 fatalities and 2 injuries coded in separate event).

properties.actor1: CNDD-FDD-Imbonerakure: National Council for the Defence of Democracy (Imbonerakure Faction)
properties.notes: On 8 August, a resident of Karire locality, Bitare zone, was killed after being humiliated and tortured by members of the Imbonerakure who accused him of theft.

properties.actor1: CNDD-FDD-Imbonerakure: National Council for the Defence of Democracy (Imbonerakure Faction)
properties.notes: On 8 August, the members of the Imbonerakure from Magara, Bujumbura beat and arrested a resident of Magara locality, accusing him of assaulting one of their friends.

properties.actor1: Batwa Ethnic Militia (Burundi)
properties.notes: A young man from Ngugo hill in Maramvya area of Nyabikere commune in Karuzi province was seriously wounded by unknown assailants on August 08, 2018. Some sources say that the attack was carried out by members of the Batwa community as a vengeance for a recent killing of one of their peers.

properties.actor1: Protesters (Burundi)
properties.notes: On 7 August, Lumitel employees protested nationwide against the dismissal of 63 of their colleagues. Detail of locations not reported.

properties.actor1: Unidentified Armed Group (Burundi)
properties.notes: A group of five men in police uniforms looted three kiosks in a small center on Gerangabo hill in Rwisabi area of Mutaho commune in Gitega province on August 07, 2018.

properties.actor1: FNL-R: National Forces of Liberation (Rwasa Faction)
properties.notes: Armed men ambushed a military truck near Rukoko Natural Forest in Gihanga commune of Bubanza Province on 05 August 2018. Three army soldiers were killed and two wounded. The attack was allegedly perpetrated by FNL fighters of Colonel Nzabampema, who had claimed a similar attack two weeks ago.

properties.actor1: CNDD-FDD-Imbonerakure: National Council for the Defence of Democracy (Imbonerakure Faction)
properties.notes: 04 August. Imbonerakure clashed with a soldier from the Mudubugu base (location of clash not reported). One person was killed and three others sustained injuries.

properties.actor1: CNDD-FDD-Imbonerakure: National Council for the Defence of Democracy (Imbonerakure Faction)
properties.assoc_actor_1: CNDD-FDD-Imbonerakure: National Council for the Defence of Democracy (Imbonerakure Faction)
properties.notes: The secretary of Kabarore commune, Kayanza province accompanied by an Imbonerakure arrested, beat and extorted money from two men at Randa hill in Jene area on August 04, 2018. The secretary reproached the victims who are pig owners from for sending pigs to Rwanda.

properties.actor1: FNL-R: National Forces of Liberation (Rwasa Faction)
properties.assoc_actor_2: CNDD-FDD-Imbonerakure: National Council for the Defence of Democracy (Imbonerakure Faction)
properties.notes: An Imbonerakure youth from Butamuheba hill in Mungwa area in Gitegaa commune and province was beaten by two FNL pro-Agathon Rwasa members on August 04, 2018.

properties.actor1: CNDD-FDD: National Council for the Defence of Democracy-Forces for the Defence of Democracy
properties.assoc_actor_2: FRODEBU: Front for Democracy in Burundi
properties.notes: The deputy leader of CNDD-FDD party in Rango commune of Kayanza province beat and wounded, with a bicycle chain, a member of Sahwanya FRODEBU party of Rama hill in Rango area on 4 August. 2018. The assailant reproached him for not participating in a national holiday celebration of the communes.

properties.actor1: CNDD-FDD-Imbonerakure: National Council for the Defence of Democracy (Imbonerakure Faction)
properties.assoc_actor_2: FNL-R: National Forces of Liberation (Rwasa Faction)
properties.notes: On 3 August, three FNL pro-Rwasa militants were beaten up by ten Imbonerakure in Bibara, Karuzi.

properties.actor1: Unidentified Armed Group (Burundi)
properties.notes: Men dressed in military uniforms belonging to an armed group attacked three bistros on Ruzibazi Hill in Mayuyu area of Mukike commune in Bujumbura-rural province on 3 August 2018. Three men died on the spot and one was wounded. Soldiers from Musinzira position intervened, killing one of the attackers and capturing another one. The armed group comes from Mugamba commune in Bururi province.

properties.actor1: CNDD-FDD-Imbonerakure: National Council for the Defence of Democracy (Imbonerakure Faction)
properties.notes: Young Imbonerakure from Mbizi hill of Kibago area and commune in Makamba province raped a widowed woman on August 03, 2018. The assailants also humiliated her and the man whom she paid a visit to by driving them naked to the police station.

properties.actor1: Military Forces of Burundi (2005-)
properties.notes: The commander of Mujejuru camp in Mugongo-Manga commune of Bujumbura-rural province and his guard tortured on 3 Aug 2018 a member of an armed group that had attacked three bistros on Ruzibazi hill in the province. The victim was gravely wounded.

properties.actor1: CNDD-FDD-Imbonerakure: National Council for the Defence of Democracy (Imbonerakure Faction)
properties.assoc_actor_2: FNL-R: National Forces of Liberation (Rwasa Faction); Women (Burundi)
properties.notes: A woman who is member of FNL pro-Agathon Rwasa from Mufumya hill in Butaganzwa area of Kayanza province was shot dead during the night from 3 to 4 August 2018. Young Imbonerakure were suspected of being behind the incident.

properties.actor1: CNDD-FDD-Imbonerakure: National Council for the Defence of Democracy (Imbonerakure Faction)
properties.assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Burundi); FRODEBU: Front for Democracy in Burundi
properties.notes: The secretary of Kabarore commune in Kayanza province together with other young Imbonerakure beat, arrested, tied up and extorted 60,000 BIF from a coffee farmer and a member of Sahwanya FRODEBU party on 3 August 2018 on Randa hill in the area. They accused him of selling green coffee to Rwanda.

properties.actor1: Rioters (Burundi)
properties.notes: A man from Kahirwa hill in Buhindo area of Murwi commune of Cibitoke province beat up and critically wounded his neighbour on 2 August 2018. He accused the victim of witchcraft.

properties.actor1: Kibaya Communal Militia (Burundi)
properties.notes: The body of a man was found on Kibaya hill in Ndora area in Bukinanyana commune of Cibitoke province on 02 August 2018. The victim was known as a holy man/ witch doctor in his community. His body wore stabwounds.

properties.actor1: Police Forces of Burundi (2005-) National Intelligence Service
properties.assoc_actor_2: CNDD-FDD-Imbonerakure: National Council for the Defence of Democracy (Imbonerakure Faction)
properties.notes: A young Imbonerakure from Gashoho Displacement Site in Muyinga province was kidnapped by agents of National Intelligence Service (SNR) on 2 August 2018 from a bar at a junction with Kirundo province. He had been accused by his kidnappers of spreading rumors about a possible attack on Burundi by Rwanda. His location is unknown.

properties.actor1: Unidentified Armed Group (Burundi)
properties.assoc_actor_2: CNDD-FDD: National Council for the Defence of Democracy-Forces for the Defence of Democracy
properties.notes: A grenade was thrown at the home of a CNDD-FDD leader on Ceru Hill in Cewe area of Kirundo commune and province on July 31, 2018. No harm was done. The perpetrators are unknown.

properties.actor1: Rioters (Burundi)
properties.notes: A woman from Murehe Hill in Nyabitsinda area and commune of Ruyigi province was nearly killed on 31 July 2018 by her former neighbours who accused her of witchcraft. The incident occurred as the victim was returning from Tanzania on a UNHCR bus that was targeted with stones by the perpetrators. The victim has previously fled a popular justice act when her neighbours buried her alive.

properties.actor1: Unidentified Armed Group (Burundi)
properties.notes: 31 July. An unidentified armed group abducted a civilian from Ngozi province.

properties.actor1: CNDD-FDD-Imbonerakure: National Council for the Defence of Democracy (Imbonerakure Faction)
properties.notes: Non-violent activity: On 31 July, some Imbonerakure placed checkpoints in Gihanga, Bubanza, harassing people to pay their contribution to 2020 elections.

properties.actor1: CNDD-FDD-Imbonerakure: National Council for the Defence of Democracy (Imbonerakure Faction)
properties.notes: A young woman from Shari-Gisovu Hill in Bubanza area, commune and province was raped by a group of men on 30 July 2018. The rape may have been committed by young Imbonerakure while on their daily patrol, but it is unknown.
